introduction:
Michaël Giovanni Jules

I build micro things that communicate together.

I have 10+ years of software development experience and have fallen in love with cloud-native application development and all the exciting opportunities and challenges it brings. Through the years I have been fortunate to have worked on several Go projects ranging from small to large, monoliths and microservices. I 😍 working in Go and Elixir but as you can already tell, I like Front-end techs too 😏.
